explains: n. 夯工，拍压的人；打夯机
wordGroup: tamper with 篡改；贿赂；胡乱摆弄

sentences.en: For your safety, never tamper with these systems.
sentences.cn: 为了您的安全，请勿篡改这些系统。

sentences.en: You have no right to tamper with others' affairs.
sentences.cn: 你无权干涉别人的事情。

sentences.en: Who are they to tamper with the rules of the game?
sentences.cn: 他们凭什么擅自修改比赛规则？
